posts.title: Beetlejuice Adam & Barbara Masks
posts.content: This Halloween, one-up every couple in your town – and the afterlife – by dressing up in these Beetlejuice Adam and Barbara masks. These freaky masks are modeled on the ghoulish faces created by the Maitland’s in their attempt to scare the Deetz family away from their home.

posts.title: Self-Cleaning Automatic Indoor Dog Potty
posts.content: Keep your home clean and fresh when potty training your puppy by using this self-cleaning automatic indoor dog potty. It comes with built-in sensors that prevent the motor from running when your dog is on the potty and will automatically wrap and clear the pads afterwards.

posts.title: SanDisk 1TB Extreme Portable SSD
posts.content: When you’re heading away from the office or studio, the SanDisk 1TB extreme portable SSD is the drive you want to take. This pocket-sized drive features a rugged dust, dirt, and water resistant exterior that’s built to withstand drops up to six feet.

posts.title: Leather Book iPhone Case
posts.content: Keep your valued personal belongings safe from prying eyes by concealing them inside of this leather book iPhone case. It features a removable protective iPhone shell in addition to providing slots for cash, credit cards and other important documents.

posts.title: The Golf Ball Cannon
posts.content: Tired of hitting golf balls with your club? Send balls soaring through the air in an entirely new way by launching them out of the golf ball cannon! This black powder cannon features a 1018 steel barrel, brass hardware, and sits on an elegant oak carriage.

posts.title: Edible Cutlery
posts.content: Revolutionize the way you consume your meals and treats by using edible cutlery. Designed to replace wasteful plastic utensil usage, this vegan friendly cutlery is designed so it’s easy to grab and comes in three varieties including rice, wheat, and sorghum.

posts.title: Vapor Blaster Gun
posts.content: Use your downtime productively at work by creating tiny vapor rings using this vapor blaster gun. The blaster features a vibrant translucent neon green casing and fires off safe/non-toxic water rings up to twelve feet away.

posts.title: Truck Bed Organizer
posts.content: Maximize your truck’s practicality by keeping all your belongings stashed away within this truck bed organizer. Once installed, you’ll have two bed-length drawers and four ammo cans at your disposal so that all your gear remains neatly arranged.

posts.title: The Pickle Rick Game
posts.content: Live out one of Rick Sanchez’s most zany adventures by sitting down to play The Pickle Rick game. Inspired by the hilarious season 3 episode, one player takes on the role of Solenya while the other plays as Jaguar and tries to prevent The Pickle Man from escaping the compound.

posts.title: Two Person Underwear
posts.content: Get intimate with your partner like never before with the underwear designed for two people. It works perfectly for ensuring sexytime for the man, and snuggles afterwards for the woman, so it’s a win-win. This underwear is also great if you’re morbidly obese.

posts.title: The Emergency Heat & Light Candle
posts.content: The emergency heat and light candle is the versatile survival tool you can’t afford not to pack on your next outdoor excursion. Apart from a stable light source, this compact 13.5 oz soy wax candle provides soothing heat when you need it most and will burn for 75 hours.

posts.title: Emergency Breathing System
posts.content: Increase your chances of survival during a home fire by having this emergency breathing system at your side. This life saving device is designed to prevent smoke inhalation by filtering out chemical substances and removing carbon monoxide for up to five minutes.
